memberships.title: Multimedia content
memberships.content: From explainers and charticles to exclusive video interviews and podcasts with who’s who of the retail ecosystem, IR Prime will open a whole new world of retail insights.

memberships.title: Get Special discounts for all IMAGES Group events
memberships.content: IR Prime members get 10%-20% discounts on tickets to industry-leading events by IMAGES Group including retail’s biggest industry conference Phygital Retail Convention.

memberships.title: 6 Exclusive Newsletters
memberships.content: IR Prime Members get focussed newsletters covering key categories and functions of retail such as Fashion & Lifestyle, Beauty & Wellness, Technology, Food & Beverages delivered to their Inbox every day

memberships.title: Exclusive insights by industry leaders & veterans (collage pic of people featured)
memberships.content: IR Prime Members will get access to a host of actionable insights and ideas by leaders and veterans of Indian retail industry through exclusive articles, interviews and podcasts.
